content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
I don't have the ability to remember past interactions. However, I'm here to help you with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss right now. How can I assist you today?
what , but i ahve modules for save memory , and i don even have a json file stored fact of me as my name

I apologize for the confusion. You're right that I have capabilities to save and recall information, but I don't have any stored information about you yet. We can start by saving some information if you'd like. Would you like to tell me your name so I can remember it for future conversations?
